subject: Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Ken Feinberg, who ran the Sept. 11 victim fund, has been hired by Penn State in its effort to settle personal injury claims related to former assistant football coach Jerry Sandusky’s sexual abuse scandal.
snippet: Ken Feinberg, who ran the Sept. 11 victim fund, has been hired by Penn State in its effort to settle personal injury claims related to former assistant football coach Jerry Sandusky’s sexual abuse scandal.
